item.title: Snapchat: What You Should And Shouldn't Believe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Nova was the videoly that we all wanted to read in the Sixties because every issue brought something new and relevant to our lives: extraordinary fashion by Molly Parkin; innovative layouts and photographs by Harri Peccinotti; articles about the Pill and our new sexual freedom and a different take on beauty, fashion and celebrity - for one incredibly complicated story, we revamped the Queen. Our editor, Dennis Hackett, always thought outside the box a

item.title: Meet Google Gnome, the smart garden gnome
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="462,461,460"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vNOllWX-2aE"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.

Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="478,477,475,476"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qU0Il2QuZXo"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="504,503"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4nbhfrQfRRE"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="531,528,532"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2PyXVvJr-zc"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Nova was the videoly that we all wanted to read in the Sixties because every issue brought something new and relevant to our lives: extraordinary fashion by Molly Parkin; innovative layouts and photographs by Harri Peccinotti; articles about the Pill and our new sexual freedom and a different take on beauty, fashion and celebrity - for one incredibly complicated story, we revamped the Queen. Our editor, Dennis Hackett, always thought outside the box a

item.title: Uber's Billion Dollar Secret Plan
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Our editor, Dennis Hackett, always thought outside the box a

[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: iPhone 8 Leak Reveals Massive New Secret
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Nova was the videoly that we all wanted to read in the Sixties because every issue brought something new and relevant to our lives: extraordinary fashion by Molly Parkin; innovative layouts and photographs by Harri Peccinotti; articles about the Pill and our new sexual freedom and a different take on beauty, fashion and celebrity - for one incredibly complicated story, we revamped the Queen. Our editor, Dennis Hackett, always thought outside the box a

item.title: Can we get beyond Tech innovation with design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][rs_sound_cloud_embed src="``https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/302683451&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true``" width="``100%``" height="``450``" frameborder="``no``" sound_cloud_url="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/272473515&color=ff5500&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false Close"][rs_space lg_device="30" md_device="" sm_device="" xs_device=""][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]
We look our best in subdued colors, sophisticated cuts, and a general air of sleek understatement. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

Introducing New World Lenses

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Groups can be created while sending a Snap, or when you’re making a new Chat. When your friends are present in a Group Chat, we show their name at the bottom of the Chat. Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Our editor, Dennis Hackett, always thought outside the box a

Spectacles are sunglasses with an integrated video camera that makes it easy to create Memories.We’ve created one of the smallest wireless video cameras in the world.[/vc_column_text][rs_gallery_showcase images="451,453,449"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]Our Stories have provided behind the scenes Snaps from interesting events all around the world — from the field of the Super Bowl to the summit of Mount Everest! Over time, the number of Snaps that were created by our community and added to Our Story simply overwhelmed our curation team — and inspired us to create something new.[/vc_column_text][rs_blockquote cite="Elliot Forson"]I like the things around me to be beautiful & slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness.[/rs_blockquote][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]

A Story for Everything

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We launched Lenses over a year ago as a whole new way to express ourselves on Snapchat. Since then, we've become puppies, puked rainbows, face-swapped with our best friends — and begun to explore how Lenses can change the world around us.While Snapping with the rear-facing camera, simply tap the camera screen to find new Lenses that can paint the world around you![/vc_column_text][rs_video_block video_url="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XyqQtm4wETA"][vc_column_text wrap_with_class="no"]We did, however, make a change to the way we operate our business in London. Going forward, we will bill our advertising revenue from the U.K. (and a few other countries) through a U.K. entity. This allows us to pay taxes in the U.K., which we believe is part of being a good local partner as we grow our business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
